blackdoor.cqbe.output_logic

Class Router

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackdoor.cqbe.output_logic.Router

  • public class Router
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles routing through the overlay network, resolution of overlay addresses, sending RPCs and resolving replies
    Author:
    nfischer3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Router()
      Create a new router, will look for a node on localhost:defaultport to use as bootstrapping node TODO decide default port, probably in settings
      Router(blackdoor.cqbe.addressing.AddressTable bootstrapTable)
      Create a new router with an address table to use for routing.
      Router(java.lang.String bootstrapNode, int bootstrapIP)
      Create a new router that will contact bootstrapNode for an address table to use for routing.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void call(blackdoor.cqbe.addressing.Address destination, int RPC)
      Send a RPC to destination and return the reply
      static void call(blackdoor.cqbe.addressing.AddressTable destinations, int RPC)
      Send an RPC to all nodes in an AddressTable and return the consensus response.
      blackdoor.cqbe.addressing.AddressTable resolveAddress(blackdoor.cqbe.addressing.Address destination)
      Resolve the network layer addresses and ports of neighbors to destination by routing through the network.
      void routeWithCalls(int RPC)
      Route RPC to its destination, but call it on nodes along the way.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Router

        public Router()
        Create a new router, will look for a node on localhost:defaultport to use as bootstrapping node TODO decide default port, probably in settings

      • Router

        public Router(blackdoor.cqbe.addressing.AddressTable bootstrapTable)
        Create a new router with an address table to use for routing.
        Parameters:
        bootstrapTable - Any address table containing valid nodes in the network.

      • Router

        public Router(java.lang.String bootstrapNode,
      int bootstrapIP)
        Create a new router that will contact bootstrapNode for an address table to use for routing.
        Parameters:
        bootstrapNode - Any node in the network. Should be a trusted node.
        bootstrapIP - The IP address on which bootstrapNode is listening.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveAddress

        public blackdoor.cqbe.addressing.AddressTable resolveAddress(blackdoor.cqbe.addressing.Address destination)
        Resolve the network layer addresses and ports of neighbors to destination by routing through the network.
        Parameters:
        destination - an overlay address for which nearby layer 3 addresses should be resolved.
        Returns:
        an AddressTable filled with the nearest neighbors of destination.
